speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: Welcome to the Voice Clone engine, marked in purple. This is perhaps the most powerful tool in the suite, allowing you to replicate a specific person's voice.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: To begin, you must provide a Source Voice. This is a short audio file containing the voice you wish to clone. We will discuss what makes a good source file in the next chapter.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: For the highest quality clone, you should also provide a transcript of the words spoken in the reference audio. The 'Transcribe' button can help with this.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: If you do not have a transcript, you can check the 'Ignore Text' box. The engine will focus only on the acoustic properties of the voice, but the result may be less accurate.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: Once your source audio and transcript are ready, you can type any new text into the 'Target Text' box and the engine will generate it in the cloned voice.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: Let's now discuss a critical step for good results: preparing your audio. Please load chapter nine.
